scripts.capacitor:init: npx cap add android && npx cap add ios
scripts.build:web: rimraf www && mkdir www && copyfiles -u 1 public/* www && copyfiles index.html App.tsx index.tsx constants.tsx types.ts www && copyfiles -u 1 "components/**/*.tsx" www && copyfiles -u 1 "services/**/*.ts" www
scripts.build:android-debug: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android && (cd android && gradlew.bat assembleDebug)
